title: (Fri Early Bird) Why Does Eddie Think Todays "Youth" Is Losing It? + Easy Trivia + Mailbag: Roommate Puppy Drama
itunes:title: (Fri Early Bird) Why Does Eddie Think Todays "Youth" Is Losing It? + Easy Trivia + Mailbag: Roommate Puppy Drama
description:
Happy Friday! We start the day with a thought from everyone, find out what happened that makes Eddie think todays "youth" is losing it. Plus, it's Easy Trivia time! The show competes against each other answering questions everyone should know. Who will get the crown this time? Mailbag: a listener told her friend she could live with her a few months ago. But now she's getting a puppy and she doesn't want a puppy in the house. How does she tell her this without making thinks weird? We share our advice!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
